casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

November 26, 2013

[Cite as 11/26/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-5210.]

MEDIATION MATTERS

2012-1404. HD Dev. Co. v. Cuyahoga Cty. Bd. of Revision.

Board of Tax Appeals, Nos. 2009-K-57 through 2009-K-99, and 2011-K-1042 through 2011-K-1084.

The following case has been referred to mediation pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 19.01(A). It is further ordered, sua sponte, that oral argument scheduled before a master commissioner for December 3, 2013, is vacated.
